Player History
Drafted in 30th round, 478th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Traded from Houston to Brooklyn on 6/30/2015 (Going to BRO: 1B Efren Garlow. Going to HOU: C Eldon Gowin)...
Drafted in Rule 5 Draft, 1st round, by New York in 2016...
Traded from New York to Chicago on 3/2/2016 (Going to CHI: 1B Efren Garlow, P Cosme Delariva, P Alfred Hanger. Going to NY: RF Draft Compensation)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/5/2016, off Joey Palomo (BRO)...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 3/1/2019 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 3/19/2019 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
